## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 30,000 units                             |
| Rationale                         | To cover forecasted demand with a buffer, maintain stock levels above the minimum threshold for a discount, and allow for potential demand variability. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | 10,000 units higher than the player's planned order size to ensure adequate stock coverage for potential fluctuations in demand. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 1.5 days                                 |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 7 days                                   |
| Comments                          | Purchasing multiple vendor order quantities (3 x 10,000 units) allows for greater flexibility and optimizes the total order size. Ordering 30,000 units enables a 25% discount, further improving cost efficiency while ensuring stock availability. |
